function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of appropriate home environments for at-home work during COVID-19","Impact":"Reduced productivity, increased stress, and potential spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Design and implement home environments that support productivity and health, including designated work areas and ventilation systems","Technologies":"Smart home technology, ventilation systems, remote monitoring tools","People":"Individuals working from home, families living together","Owner":"Homeowners, architects, interior designers"},{"Description":"Inadequate management of infrastructural and technical facilities","Impact":"Increased risk of disease spread and compromised health and safety","Mitigation":"Implement effective management teams for infrastructural and technical facilities, maintain regular hygiene and safety protocols","Technologies":"Digital risk monitoring, BIM, video surveillance, IoT, non-invasive temperature monitoring","People":"Facilities management teams, construction and work site staff","Owner":"Facility managers, construction companies"},{"Description":"Insufficient adaptation of facilities management in response to COVID-19","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission, inefficiencies in energy use, and suboptimal space management","Mitigation":"Adapt Proptech for wellbeing, energy efficiency, and data management, integrate remote health reporting and diagnoses in daily plans","Technologies":"Proptech, remote health reporting tools, data management systems","People":"Workplace occupants, facilities management staff","Owner":"Proptech companies, facilities management teams"}]}
